feed.title: Shared Moments Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Shared Moments: 1.2.0
entry.content:
• fixed a bug if one import file is empty
  • added an option to set a wedding date if the relationship status is married. This date will be used instead of the anniversary date

entry.title: New release for Shared Moments: 1.3.0
entry.content:
• You can now check in the settings whether you have the latest version installed and see when an update is available.
  • Fixed a bug where editing an entry with a filename containing special characters would cause encoding by your browser.
  • Added the title and creation date of the entry in the email when files are missing.

entry.title: New release for Shared Moments: 1.3.1
entry.content:
• bug fixed that the gallery sometimes did not display #2
  • bug fixed that the title of the gallery sometimes not get updated by the locales #2

entry.title: New release for Shared Moments: 1.3.2
entry.content: • SharedMoments is now available in Portuguese and Spanish. Thanks to @RomuloGatto!

entry.title: New release for Shared Moments: 1.3.3
entry.content:
• updated dependencies
  • bug fixed on iOS/Safari if the countdown time was in the past
  • added a logout function #4
  • added support for .mov-Videos #4
